title: Chicken noodle soup with a twist
ingredients: ['1.5L (3pt) chicken stock', '2 whole chicken breasts', '1 onion, chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 stick of celery, chopped', '1 leek, chopped', '1 (2cm) piece root ginger, chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1/2 teaspoon chilli (from the jar)', '1 bouquet garni or teaspoon mixed herbs', 'salt and black pepper, to taste', '1 handful cooked noodles, chopped']
